title: Experienced Founders with an Outside Perspective
subtitle: A proven leadership combination of strategic execution and technical innovation

members.name: Doug Henston
members.bio: Serial company builder with 25+ years scaling frontier innovations from lab to market. Yale biophysics, Harvard MBA, Naval Aviator, and Goldman Sachs veteran who raised $400M+ for regulated ventures. Disciplined risk management and institutional funding expertise.

members.name: Ned Harvey
members.bio: Engineering innovator and Harvard MBA with 20+ years pioneering data-driven solutions. Former Naval Submariner, Digital Gaia co-founder, and RMI Climate Intelligence architect. Specializes in translating complex systems into market-ready products.
